sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_across_etc (f_ascoss_server_id, f_character_id, f_old_area_id, f_old_character_id, f_old_wedder_id, f_old_wedder_name, f_old_gang_id, f_old_gang_name, f_old_gang_area_id, f_old_wedder_area_id, f_account_id, f_old_account_id, f_is_bangzhu, f_is_chengzhu, f_gang_grade, f_wedder_quanpei_id, f_wedder_time, f_old_wedder_menpai, f_old_wedder_dantian, f_old_character_initially_id, f_old_account_initially_id, f_guoshi_flag) values (#ascossServerId:INTEGER#, #characterId:INTEGER#, #oldAreaId:INTEGER#, #oldCharacterId:INTEGER#, #oldWedderId:INTEGER#, #oldWedderName:VARCHAR#, #oldGangId:INTEGER#, #oldGangName:VARCHAR#, #oldGangAreaId:INTEGER#, #oldWedderAreaId:INTEGER#, #accountId:INTEGER#, #oldAccountId:INTEGER#, #isBangzhu:INTEGER#, #isChengzhu:INTEGER#, #gangGrade:INTEGER#, #wedderQuanpeiId:INTEGER#, #wedderTime:TIMESTAMP#, #oldWedderMenpai:TINYINT#, #oldWedderDantian:TINYINT#, #oldCharacterInitiallyId:INTEGER#, #oldAccountInitiallyId:INTEGER#, #guoshiFlag:TINYINT#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update t_across_etc set f_ascoss_server_id = #ascossServerId:INTEGER#, f_character_id = #characterId:INTEGER#, f_old_area_id = #oldAreaId:INTEGER#, f_old_character_id = #oldCharacterId:INTEGER#, f_old_wedder_id = #oldWedderId:INTEGER#, f_old_wedder_name = #oldWedderName:VARCHAR#, f_old_gang_id = #oldGangId:INTEGER#, f_old_gang_name = #oldGangName:VARCHAR#, f_old_gang_area_id = #oldGangAreaId:INTEGER#, f_old_wedder_area_id = #oldWedderAreaId:INTEGER#, f_account_id = #accountId:INTEGER#, f_old_account_id = #oldAccountId:INTEGER#, f_is_bangzhu = #isBangzhu:INTEGER#, f_is_chengzhu = #isChengzhu:INTEGER#, f_gang_grade = #gangGrade:INTEGER#, f_wedder_quanpei_id = #wedderQuanpeiId:INTEGER#, f_wedder_time = #wedderTime:TIMESTAMP#, f_old_wedder_menpai = #oldWedderMenpai:TINYINT#, f_old_wedder_dantian = #oldWedderDantian:TINYINT#, f_old_character_initially_id = #oldCharacterInitiallyId:INTEGER#, f_old_account_initially_id = #oldAccountInitiallyId:INTEGER#, f_guoshi_flag = #guoshiFlag:TINYINT# where f_id = #id:INTEGER#
